GlAccount.accountName: Number of opinions of the Scientific Committee/Scientific Panel
GlAccount.description: Sum of all the opinions of the Scientific Committee/Scientific Panel in the selected range of time

GlAccount.accountName: Number of statements of the Scientific Committee /Scientific Panel
GlAccount.description: Sum of all the statements of the Scientific Committee/Scientific Panel in the selected range of time

GlAccount.accountName: Number of guidance documents of the Scientific Committee/ Scientific Panel
GlAccount.description: Sum of all the guidance of the Scientific Committee/Scientific Panel in the selected range of time

GlAccount.accountName: Number of EFSA conclusions on Pesticides Peer Review
GlAccount.description: Sum of EFSA conclusions on Pesticides Peer Review in the selected range of time
Sum of reasoned opinions
Sum of Comms activities [PR-Press Release and WS-Web Stories] in the selected range of time

GlAccount.accountName: Number of scientific reports of EFSA
GlAccount.description: Sum of scientific reports of EFSA in the selected range of time
Sum of technical reports in the selected range of time
Sum of external scientific reports in the selected range of time
Sum of event reports in the selected range of time

GlAccount.accountName: Total number of applications currently worked on
Press releases|web stories currently worked on that are ‘on track'
GlAccount.description: Sum of communication activities (WS+FS and PR) published Vs target

GlAccount.accountName: Global commitment rate versus global target
GlAccount.description: Total appropriation commitment vs total target. Sum at EFSA level (REPRO, RASA, SCISTRAT, COMMS, RESU, EXO) of all executed commitment appropriation vs total target, in the selected range of time.

GlAccount.accountName: Global payment rate versus global target
GlAccount.description: Total payment Vs total target. Sum at EFSA level (REPRO, RASA, SCISTRAT, COMMS, RESU, EXO) of all executed payments Vs total target, in the selected range of time.

GlAccount.accountName: Total topics commitment appropriation Vs total target Scientific operations (Scientific meetings - Communication activities - IT support - Events streaming)
GlAccount.description: Total topics appropriation commitments Vs total target. Sum of topics at EFSA level (REPRO, RASA, SCISTRAT, COMMS, RESU, EXO) of all executed commitment appropriation Vs total target, in the selected range of time.

GlAccount.accountName: Total topics payments appropriation Vs total target Scientific operations (Scientific meetings - Communication activities - IT support - Events streaming)
GlAccount.description: Total topics payments Vs total target. Sum of topics at EFSA level (REPRO, RASA, SCISTRAT, COMMS, RESU, EXO) of all payments vs total target, in the selected range of time.
Sum of total application on track vs total application in the selected range of time

GlAccount.accountName: Sum of the mandates received in the time frame for which all the expected units have a question attached to the appropriate mandate
Total number of mandates received in the selected time frame
Number of Mandates linked to the related question Vs the total number of Mandates registered in RAW (linked and unlinked)
GlAccount.description: Sum of the mandates received in the time frame for which all the expected units have a question attached to the appropriate mandate out of the total number of mandates received in the selected range of time

GlAccount.accountName: Sum of all the questions within the 90% of available time
Total number of questions in the selected range of time
Questions completed more than 10% of time before required deadline Vs total number of questions
GlAccount.description: Sum of all the questions within the 90% of available time Vs total number of questions in the selected range of time

GlAccount.accountName: Number of Applications for Regulated products adopted on time
Total number adopted, in the selected range of time
Number of Applications for Regulated products adopted on time Vs total number adopted, in the selected range of time
GlAccount.description: Sum of Regulated products output on time, divided by sum of Regulated products output referred to the same selected range of time.

GlAccount.accountName: Number of Scientific outputs adopted on time
Total number of Scientific outputs adopted
Number of Scientific outputs adopted on time Vs total number adopted
GlAccount.description: Sum of Scientific output on time, divided by sum of Scientific output referred to the same selected range of time.

GlAccount.accountName: Number of scientific outputs published on time (without comm activities type: press release or web story)
Total number of scientific outputs published (without comm activities type: press release or web story)
Number of scientific outputs published on time (without comm activities type: press release or web story) Vs total number published
GlAccount.description: Sum of scientific outputs published on time without comm activities type: press release or web story Vs total number published referred to the same selected range of time.

GlAccount.accountName: Number of outputs accompanied by a press release or web story published on time
Total number of outputs accompanied by a press release or web story published
Number of outputs accompanied by a press release or web story published on time Vs total number published
GlAccount.description: Sum of scientific outputs published on time with comm activities type: press release or web story Vs total number published referred to the same selected range of time.
